mapper.insert: insert into user (id, age, create_time, create_user, name, password, update_time, update_user) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update user
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
